translation.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
translation.faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below.
translation.faq.q1.question: Is 123LegalDoc a law firm?
translation.faq.q1.answer: No, 123LegalDoc is a software platform that provides tools for creating legal documents. We are not a law firm and do not provide legal advice. We recommend consulting with a qualified attorney for complex legal matters.
translation.faq.q2.question: Are the documents legally binding?
translation.faq.q2.answer: Our documents are attorney-reviewed and designed to be legally sound when filled out correctly and used appropriately for your jurisdiction. However, laws vary by state and specific situations. For critical matters, review by a local attorney is always recommended.
translation.faq.q3.question: How does the AI help?
translation.faq.q3.answer: Our AI can help you identify the type of document you might need based on your description. It also assists in guiding you through the questionnaires and may offer suggestions for specific clauses.
translation.faq.q4.question: Can I customize the documents?
translation.faq.q4.answer: Yes! After answering the guided questions, you'll typically have an opportunity to preview and edit the document content before finalizing it.
translation.faq.q5.question: What if I need a document for a specific U.S. state?
translation.faq.q5.answer: Many of our documents are tailored for or allow selection of U.S. states to include state-specific clauses where necessary. Always ensure the document matches your state's requirements.
translation.faq.q6.question: How do I pay for documents?
translation.faq.q6.answer: We offer a pay-per-document model. After you've filled out your document, you'll proceed to a secure payment page. We also offer bundles and occasionally promotional credits.

translation.home.testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
translation.home.testimonials.t1.quote: 123LegalDoc made creating my rental agreement incredibly simple. The process was intuitive, and the final document was professional and thorough. Saved me a lot of time and potential headaches!
translation.home.testimonials.t1.name: Sarah L.
translation.home.testimonials.t1.title: Landlord
translation.home.testimonials.t2.quote: As a freelancer, I needed a solid Independent Contractor Agreement. This platform delivered exactly what I needed, with clear language and all the necessary clauses. Fantastic resource!
translation.home.testimonials.t2.name: Mike P.
translation.home.testimonials.t2.title: Graphic Designer
translation.home.testimonials.t3.quote: I was daunted by the thought of drafting a Bill of Sale for my car, but 123LegalDoc guided me through it effortlessly. The state-specific considerations were a huge plus.
translation.home.testimonials.t3.name: Jessica B.
translation.home.testimonials.t3.title: Private Seller
translation.home.testimonials.t4.quote: The AI document inference feature is brilliant! It helped me identify the right Non-Disclosure Agreement I needed for a sensitive business discussion. Impressive tech!
translation.home.testimonials.t4.name: David K.
translation.home.testimonials.t4.title: Startup Founder
translation.home.testimonials.t5.quote: Getting a Power of Attorney was something I kept putting off. This site made it straightforward and affordable. Peace of mind achieved!
translation.home.testimonials.t5.name: Laura H.
translation.home.testimonials.t5.title: Family Caregiver
